ul.li: Jamoma 0.6 overview General presentation of Jamoma 0.6 features
Make a Jamoma model patcher - How to turn a patchers into a Jamoma model patcher
Using models within your patcher - How to instanciate and communicate to your models
Make a model view patcher - How to a patcher view for your model
Attributes and methods specification - How to fine tune your model services
Model inputs and outputs - How to manage inputs and outpus in your models
Model presets - How to set and recall model presets
Parameters priorities - How to manage parameters value priorities
Working with units - How to setup and use Jamoma units
Ramping - How to set up and use ramp features
Overriding features - How to override model settings
Namespace exploration and queries - How to manage models in Jamoma namespace
Remote control - How to use model and views on distant computers
Remote application communication - How to use Jamoma with distant applications
